title: Kalaupapa National Historical Park: Bookstore
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Bookstore            Bookstore        The Kalaupapa National Historical Park bookstore, located at the American Japanese Ancestry (AJA) Hall. NPS photo / T. Scott Williams   Â   Pacific Historic Parks (PHP) is a nonprofit cooperating association that operates the Kalaupapa National Historical Park bookstore. Proceeds from the park bookstore support interpretation, educational programs, research projects, publications, and cultural activities in the park. The bookstore is located at the American of Japanese Ancestry (AJA) Buddhist Hall, which is one of the stops along the commercial tour. Please note the bookstore has limited operating hours on Monday through Saturday and is closed Sundays. Visitors can also purchase Kalaupapa books and gifts at the PHP online store.
